title: Electric Ambience (Puzzle, Narrative, and Exploration Music)
description: Bring Intrigue and Ambiance to your game with Electric Ambience!
longDescription:
Electric Ambience is designed to invoke wonder, mystery, suspense, placid calmness and even light horror! Using a variety of soft and hard synths, as well as modulating effects, Electric Ambience offers a variety of soundscapes and melodies that can build your world and bring your game to life without distracting from the player becoming completely immersed in the game play. All tracks are royalty-free and youtube-safe!



- 10 Stunning Tracks: Over 25 minutes of high-quality audio, crafted to invoke mystery, suspense, light horror and calm ambience


- Studio-grade Quality: 24bit/48khz WAV files ensure the best sound performance.


- Each title includes bpm, allowing seamless loop creation in your middleware.


- Tracks ranging from:

  - Calm, placid ambient pieces.

  - Ominous, atmospheric soundscapes.

  - Creepy, light-horror cues

 - Wondrous Awe and Delight 


A Full, Listen-Only version of the OST can be found here:

https://youtu.be/g9vOWxWYSUA
